speaker.whotheyare: Kristen Warren is a jazz/neo-soul singer from Melbourne, Florida.
speaker.whylisten:
Kristen Warren has performed in many venues across the US East Coast, including SOFAR NYC, SOFAR Atlanta and Florida Music Festival. In 2021 she headlined the Space Coast Music festival. It is through her music that she tries to uplift her listeners, encouraging them to "go for it, do it, be it!"

Warren is the founder of BlackBox Blackout, which is an organization that celebrates Black creativity and hosts an annual month-long festival every February. She is also the founder of Mural series, which is a filmed performance series that features the work of local songwriters and muralists. To learn more about both these projects, see here.
